title: Test
summary: This grouped bar chart has 2 categories of Country on the x axis representing 6 groups: North America, EU, Eastern Europe, Asia-Pacific, Middle East & Africa, and South America.
Averaging the 6 groups, the highest category is found for Country 2022 with a mean value of 23.52.
The minimum category is found at 2015 with a mean value of 20.93.

In case of 2022, North America shows more dominance than any other Country with a value 228.0 and it has the lowest value 199.0 in 2015.  However, South America being the 2nd most important group, has the highest value 64.0 for Country 2022 and the lowest 58.0 in case of 2015.
